name: Crunchy Oven Fried Tilapia
author: MADISONLIBERTY
summary: This fish tastes so close to being fried without all the fat and calories!
directions: Preheat oven to 450 degrees F (230 degrees Celsius)
Sift or stir flour, salt, and pepper together in a shallow dish, and set aside
In a bowl, beat egg whites until white and frothy
In another bowl, combine bread crumbs with cornmeal and basil
To bread the fillets, dip first into flour, shaking off any excess, then into egg whites, then into bread crumb mixture
Spray a shallow baking dish with non-stick cooking spray
Lay fillets flat in the dish, tucking under any thinner ends or edges for more even cooking
Bake in the preheated oven for 10 to 15 minutes, or until fish flakes easily with a folk
